job_title: Assistant Professor in Slippery Rock, PA
pros: It's a job, I guess...
cons:
-Tons of politics and favoritism. It's not about what matters (teaching and educating the future generation). It's only about making the numbers.
-Major budget cuts for all departments. 
-Lost a ton of good benefits after the strike, especially for spouses and family. Strikes are common. 
-Overworked professors with little return. Expected to take on an inordinate amount of work (community service (unpaid), all university meetings/forums, department meetings, the list goes on and on.)
-There are literally 3 restaurants in town. Only 1 is pretty good. If you want to go anything at all, you have to drive at least an hour to Pittsburgh.

review_title: A great place to work AND learn!
